knimeNode.name: Table Array Splitter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts one specified table from an array of data tables.

fullDescription.intro:
The node allows to extract a single data table from an array of data tables. The single table can be selected in the node's dialog. Splitting a table off an array is neither a deletion from the array nor will it produce a copy of the selected table. Instead, the splitting provides referential access to the table. Every manipulation of the single table will be present in the table array as well.
You might want to extract the table with the forecasted values to view them in a table or in a graph.
fullDescription.option: Name of the table to split off the array.

ports.inPort: Port takes a data table array.
ports.outPort: Port holds the complete data table array.
Port holds the single data table.
